text: From @WSJopinion: A new study published in the Lancet suggests hydroxychloroquine, touted as a Covid treatment by the president, is harmful. A closer look at the data finds glaring errors, writes @AllysiaFinley. https://t.co/fD0SP9o4mr

text: A retired University of Miami professor who wrote a book on organized crime laundered over $2 million in proceeds from a bribery scheme in Venezuela, according to prosecutors https://t.co/wC4yeYUL0s
